template.name: model-nails
template.value:
<?php

namespace Nails\Model;

use Nails\Common\Model\Base;

class $modelName$ extends Base
{
    public function __construct()
    {
        parent::__construct();
        $this->table       = '$tableName$';
        $this->tablePrefix = '$tableAbbreviation$';
    }
}

template.name: model-app
template.value:
<?php

namespace App\Model;

use Nails\Common\Model\Base;

class $modelName$ extends Base
{
    public function __construct()
    {
        parent::__construct();
        $this->table       = '$tableName$';
        $this->tablePrefix = '$tableAbbreviation$';
    }
}
